name: Admissions Pal
tecnology: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, Stripe, JWT, PWA, Real-time Analytics
about: Interactive networking platform for students, alumni, and recruiters with role-based architecture, secure payment system, and real-time analytics.
description: Built interactive networking features that facilitate collaboration between students, alumni, and recruiters, fostering a dynamic and engaging educational community.
Designed and executed a scalable, role-based architecture to efficiently manage four distinct user flows (Admin, Student, Advisor, Recruiter), enhancing security and system performance.
Improved a secure, PCI-compliant payment system by integrating Stripe, enabling seamless subscription management and transaction processing.
Transformed the platform into a fully responsive Progressive Web App (PWA), improving offline accessibility, reducing load times, and optimizing mobile performance.
Applied real-time analytics and data-driven insights for advisors and recruiters, enhancing strategic decision-making and user engagement.

name: Microdot.ai
tecnology: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, AI Transcription, Google Meet, Zoom, Microsoft Teams
about: AI-powered meeting management platform with video integration, admin dashboard, user dashboard, and transcription system.
description: Expanded a feature-rich front end for a meeting management platform, ensuring seamless integration with Google Meet, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams.
Implemented an intuitive admin dashboard to manage users, videos, prompts, and payments, enhancing operational efficiency.
Built a responsive user dashboard to display upcoming and past meetings, with features like invite management, meeting cancellations, and recording uploads.
Integrated an AI-powered transcription system that processes audio/video uploads, generates transcripts, and enables clip creation for easy content sharing.
Optimized frontend performance using React best practices, state management, and API integrations to ensure a seamless user experience.

name: MedLink Jobs
tecnology: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Healthcare Recruitment, Job Portal, User Management
about: India's first healthcare recruitment portal connecting professionals with top job opportunities, supporting 300,000+ registered users.
description: Developed and enhanced MedLink Jobs, India's first healthcare recruitment portal, connecting professionals with top job opportunities.
Designed a scalable and efficient hiring platform, ensuring rapid, transparent, and cost-effective talent acquisition in the medical industry.
Enforced a user-centric experience with a secure and seamless job search interface, prioritizing data security and accessibility.
Engineered robust backend optimizations to support a thriving community of 300,000+ registered users, improving performance and scalability.
